entrada.name: Entrance
entrada.text: Welcome to the Autonomous University of Lisbon. Here begins your tour. Enjoy discovering the main spots on campus!

patio.name: Courtyard
patio.text: This is the university's main atrium. Many events take place here and it's a meeting point for students.

camoes.name: Camões
camoes.text: The Camões statue represents the value of Portuguese literature and culture. It's one of the most iconic symbols on our campus.
